subject: Re: Re : [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box in a Faraday Cage type enclosure
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
You're right.  I also had no idea who and whose e-mails were being 
responded to.

Zack

On Tue, 11 Nov 2008, don powell wrote:

> Well replying to digest certainly makes sense.  I had to drop digest years ago because of that.
>
> I was just having a hard time figuring out which responses were for which posts.
> No biggie but I figured if I was having the problem, other would as well.  Plus
> a reply without the context is usually nonsensical so it does not help the understanding.
>
> Again, just my perspective but I've found as I've gotten older that if I don't understand something there
> is usually a dozen or more others that don't either that just did not ask.
>
> Don
>
